|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :''5G MHS Travel Router'' ([[AT&T]]) {{FCC ST|06/17/2019|indexme.}} ==Specifications== *[https://www.4gltemall.com/netgear-nighthawk-m5-fusion.html ''Netgear Nighthawk M5 Fusion'' on '''4G|LTEmall'''] :Chipset: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.xda-developers.com/samsung-foldable-smartphone-winner-snapdragon-8150-galaxy-s9-android-pie-update/ SM8150]/[https://www.qualcomm.com/products/snapdragon-x50-5g-modem SDX50M] *[https://launchstudio.bluetooth.com/ListingDetails/69919 ''Declaration Details'' on '''Launch Studio'''] :[[Qualcomm]] SM8150/[https://www.qualcomm.com/products/wcn3998 WCN3998] (BT 5.0) *[https://www.reddit.com/r/ATT/comments/aalipg/att_nighthawk_5g_mr5000/ ''Netgear Nighthawk MR5000'' on '''Reddit'''] :Android 9 (Pie) ==Links of Interest== ===News=== * [https://blog.netgear.com/blog/netgear-nighthawk-5g-mobile-hotspot-worlds-first-standards-based-millimeter-wave-mobile-5g-device/ ''Netgear Nighthawk 5G Mobile Hotspot - World’s first standards-based
millimeter wave mobile 5G device'' on '''Netgear Blog'''] • [https://community.netgear.com/t5/Mobile-Routers-Hotspots-Modems/Nighthawk-5G-Mobile-Hotspot-World-s-First-Standards-Based/m-p/1657383 '''Netgear Forums'''] * [https://about.att.com/newsroom/2018/first_5G_connection.html ''AT&T completes the world’s first millimeter wave mobile 5G browsing
session with a standards-based commercial mobile 5G device'' on '''AT&T'''] * [https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2018/12/att-5g-goes-live-this-week-with-ridiculously-overpowered-hotspot/ ''AT&T 5G goes live this week with overpowered hotspot'' on '''Ars Technica'''] * [https://www.5g-cell.com/netgear-nighthawk-m5-worlds-first-5g-mobile-hotspot-released/ ''Netgear Nighthawk M5 – World’s First 5G Mobile Hotspot Released'' on '''Ars Technica'''] ==See also== *[[Netgear Nighthawk M1 (MR1100)]] -
